choices.name: force
choices.description: The bot will always read out the definition to you, even if not specified in the define command.

choices.name: flag
choices.description: The bot will only read out the definition to you if specified by the define command.

choices.name: disable
choices.description: The bot will never read out the definition to you, even if specified by the define command.

name: show_definition_source
description: Show the definition source when defining words.

name: language
description: The language to use when displaying definitions and speaking. This can be a two-letter language code or a language name.

name: dictionary_apis
description: A comma-separated list of dictionary APIs to use in order of preference.

name: auto_translate
description: Automatically translate words before looking up their definition.
